content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies

content_blocks.text: Digital transformation isn't just about having more technology; it's about reinventing a company's operations, interaction with customers and decision-making using digital innovations. It's about being more agile, efficient and customer-focused.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies

content_blocks.text: The specialist inInformation Systemsmakes it happen. He is not just a computer technician; he is a strategist who translates business needs into technological solutions. Like an architect, they design something modern and functional, understanding the foundation, structure and functionality for those who will use it. At Inteli, we train these architects of the future, who integrate technology, management and leadership.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies

content_blocks.text: Building the Future: Projects that Transform
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: In the classroom, digital transformation is best understood in practice. Our project-based methodology challenges students from day one, developing the skills to lead this change. Each project is a stage in their training as digital transformation leaders.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: See how our projects prepare you:
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: Data Management for Decision:In Big Data Integration, Management and Analysis, you deal with volumes of information. This is essential, because the digital transformation feeds on data. You collect, organize and interpret this data so that companies can make better decisions.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: Optimizing Operations:In Management Systems and Corporate Governance, you implement an ERP, systems that connect and optimize areas of a company (finance, operations), promoting effective governance.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: Predictions and AI:The Predictive Modeling project in business applications using Deep Learning teaches how to use artificial intelligence to predict market trends, identify complex patterns and create innovative business models. The technology anticipates the future and enables adaptation.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: Innovation and Security:In the Decentralized Software project using Blockchain, you explore a technology that revolutionizes sectors, bringing transparency and security to digital transactions. Being at the forefront of these innovations means being a digital transformer.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: User Experience:In Digital Interface User Behavior Analysis, you study how people interact with digital products, using tools to improve experience and engagement. You not only build, but improve solutions.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: Visual Strategic Decisions:The Management Data Reporting and Dashboards project shows how to create intuitive dashboards that translate complex data into clear visual information for strategic decision-making.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: These projects show that the IS professional combines technical computer knowledge, business vision and leadership and communication skills. This integration drives digital transformation.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: Building the Future: Projects that Transform

content_blocks.text: A market that is crying out for this skill
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: A market that is crying out for this skill

content_blocks.text: The demand for professionals who drive digital transformation is growing and intense. A BRASSCOM study points to a high demand for technology professionals in Brazil.TheWorld Economic Forum's "The Future of Jobs Report 2023" highlights that technology generates many jobs and that analytical thinking, creativity and adaptability are valued. Reports byKPMGandDeloitteindicate digital transformation as a priority for CEOs globally.
content_blocks.section: The role of the IS professional in the digital transformation of companies
content_blocks.subsection: A market that is crying out for this skill

content_blocks.text: If you see yourself as a leader, like to solve problems and want to use technology to innovate and transform the business landscape, the course inInformation Systems course at Inteliis the place for you. Come and be the professional who builds the digital future!
